# Vert.x 3 Full stack

Vert.x3 + the endorsed modules

## Contents

* Vert.x Core
* Groovy, JS and Ruby languages
* Hazelcast clustering
* Service proxy
* Reactive programming
* Services deployment
* Vert.x Unit
* Dropwizard Metrics
* Auth + Web components
* Data components
* Mail service

More information on:

* The vert.x web site: http://vertx.io
